product_name: Patagonia Regular Fit Jeans - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: Some things are truly indispensable, including a well-worn pair of jeans. Made from tough, soft-wearing organic cotton denim, the 32 in. inseam Patagonia Regular Fit jeans will be your new favorite. Pants feature a zip fly, traditional 5-pocket styling and a comfortable fit.
short_description: Some things are truly indispensable, including a well-worn pair of jeans. Made from tough, soft-wearing organic cotton denim, the 32 in. inseam Patagonia Regular Fit jeans will be your new favorite.
